life.threedee

Class WorldObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.threedee.WorldObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreeDeeObject

    public class WorldObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThreeDeeObject
    A threedeeobject representing multiple threedeeobjects as an array

    • Method Detail

      • generateObject

        public static WorldObject generateObject(java.lang.String str)
        String is in format of (a, b, c);((a, b, c), (a, b, c), (a, b, c));... First Point is center/origin point. All subsequent point triplets are corners of triangles.

      • generateObject

      • getRData

        public TColorTransfer getRData(Vector vector,
                      Point point,
                      double minT)
        Description copied from interface: ThreeDeeObject
        Returns the t value (see calculateT), color, and this for the given direction, point, and minimum t value. The minT is passed so as to avoid calculating color if it will not be used anyways.
        Specified by:
        getRData in interface ThreeDeeObject
        Returns:

        public Point intersection(Vector vector,
                 Point point,
                 double t)
        Description copied from interface: ThreeDeeObject
